basics.name: QA ENGINEERING MANAGER
basics.label: Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Seasoned Engineering Manager with ability to build and motivate high-performing engineering team with over 14+ years of experience in cards and payments industry, committed to rapidly and efficiently completing projects by leveraging team-based frameworks to best leverage available engineering talent. Self-motivated, forward thinking mindset, solution-focused, clear communicator, decision maker and problem solver.

skills.name: QA Engineering software
keywords: Design, Estimate, Execute, Maintain, Document, Organization, Time management, resource planning

skills.name: Technical Communication
keywords: Bug Triage, reporting, technical reviews, Root cause analysis

skills.name: Leadership
keywords: Strategic Planning, Team building, Conflict resolution, Training & Development, mentoring

skills.name: Collaborating with stakeholders
keywords: Roadmap, Managing releases, Demos, Risk mitigation planning

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: 20+ EMV certs in calendar year with team of 2+ cert Analysts. Managed fast-paced project delivery from QA for time-sensitive and key projects for the company. Managed and implemented spreadsheet-based automation, that helped in improved test coverage and reduced production bug by 20% and rollbacks by 80%. Managed team of 8 employees, overseeing hiring, training, and professional growth of employees. 4 promotions within the team including 1 lead and 1 manager.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Instrumental in procuring 1st EMV certification within 6 months of joining. Established myself as the go-to person for any QA issue within QA and Merchant Implementations team.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Received core value awards - �SYNERGY� in 2009 for team building and �SMART� in 2012 for Individual performances. Nominated for BRAVO award in First Data (2012 and 2014).
